Text: Thanks and I don't mean to sound ungrateful but it's a big file to d/l without some more idea of content as I have 100s of audio ghost stories.
It contains Edgar Allen Poe, MR James, Classic tales of Ghosts and Vampires, Children of Witchwood, Sherlock Holmes vs Dracula.
Some really great stories in here.I liked the "Sherlock Holmes Vs Dracula " a lot.Thanks Papaoso.

thank you for sharing .

i just hope that the quality of the recordings would be excellent..
The Quality is very good. You will not be disappointed.

I'm starting this download now... not care vinyl rips, as I know the best of Halloween are the oldies on vinyl! You are very creative in finding some 45's to burn and upload. I wish more people would do the same!  Thank You

Great job and thank you for all the effort!
